r.s: PHP Bindings for the Subversion Revision control system.
r.d: Bindings for the Subversion revision control system, providing a method for manipulating a working copy or repository with PHP.
r.n:
Minor bug fix / feature release
Compiles with libsvn 1.9
Changes: #71025 - support for subversion 1.9 by pterjan at google dot com
------ - The new optional parameter "depth" has been added to svn_checkout(). along with new constancts SVN_DEPTH_* - by Chung, Hyung-Hwan
------ - Add missing constant SVN_IGNORE_EXTERNALS - patch by Chung, Hyung-Hwan ------ - add support for svn_propset and svn_prop_delete - patch by Chung, Hyung-Hwan ------ - add svn_revprop_(get|set|delete) - patch by Chung, Hyung-Hwan ------ - add svn_fs_txn_prop and svn_fs_open_txn, fix segfault in svn_fs_revision_prop - patch by Chung, Hyung-Hwan ------ - Fixes to svn_cat / svn_fs_apply_text - solves memory leak - patch by Chung, Hyung-Hwan ------ - Added check for possible NULL message
